answerText: Guangzhou [or Canton][10] Guangzhou is in this country, also home to older architectural marvels like the Great Wall and the Forbidden City.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | 1. Chicago A - MIT B | 7 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This city is home to the supertall CITIC plaza. For 10 points each: [10] Name this city, also home to a Joseph di Pasquale-designed giant "circle," the headquarter of its plastic exchange. An opera house in this city was built using a "twin-pebble design."
